summary: Validate GDPR-only intake output payloads; context_profile is authoritative with legacy locale_context allowed.

knobs.description: Filesystem path to a client intake JSON payload.
Fail validation on any schema or policy error.

risks: Context allowlists live under contracts/taxonomy; non-allowlisted jurisdiction/sector/policy packs fail closed.
Validator-enforced policy: policy_pack_stack must equal ['GDPR_EU', jurisdiction, sector, 'client'] (ordering is policy, not schema).
Mismatch between locale_context and context_profile.jurisdiction fails closed.
